name: Ski or Die (2009)
description:
★The game was made in explanation of the game SkiFree(1991)★

Would you like to relax and find yourself on top position of the world rating?
Then this game is for you!
So, you are at the ski resort in the mountains!
★You will meet different ski-jumps, competitors and even YETTI! on your way to the new records!!!
But keep in mind: you have only two ways – SKI OR DIE


★GAMEPLAY★
*Global high scores ranking system
*Endless playing
*Mode: run away from a BIG-FOOT (Yetti)!
*Nostalgic game


★UPCOMING UPDATES★
*Multiplayer mode
*New player modes: sledges and motor sledges
*Different game types
*We are ready to take into account all your wishes and ideas!!
